SEARCH

Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.events

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.events
Contains interfaces and classes for handling events related to AnimatedArchitecture structures. This includes events for when a structure is created, opened, closed, or deleted. The events in this package are used by other packages to trigger certain actions, such as playing audio.

To make it easy for external plugins to use these events as well, they should be fired using the native event handler on the platform this project is running on.

  • Class
    Description
    IAnimatedArchitectureEvent
    Represents a AnimatedArchitecture event.
    IAnimatedArchitectureEventCaller
    Represents an object that can call AnimatedArchitecture events.
    ICancellableAnimatedArchitectureEvent
    Represents a cancellable AnimatedArchitecture event.
    IStructureCreatedEvent
    Represents the event where a structure was created.
    IStructureEvent
    Represents the event where a structure was created.
    IStructureEventToggleEnd
    Represents a toggle action that has been applied to a structure.
    IStructureEventTogglePrepare
    Represents a toggle action that might be applied to a structure.
    IStructureEventToggleStart
    Represents a toggle action that will be applied to a structure.If you want to cancel the action, use IStructureEventTogglePrepare instead.
    IStructurePrepareAddOwnerEvent
    Represents the event where a new owner is added to a structure.
    IStructurePrepareCreateEvent
    Represents the event where a structure will be created.
    IStructurePrepareDeleteEvent
    Represents the event where a structure was deleted.
    IStructurePrepareLockChangeEvent
    Represents the event where a structure will be (un)locked.
    IStructurePrepareRemoveOwnerEvent
    Represents the event where an owner is removed from a structure.
    IStructureToggleEvent
     
    StructureActionCause
    Represents the different kind of causes that can be the reason of a AbstractStructure action.
    StructureActionType
    Represents the different kinds of actions that are applicable to a structure.
